Uses of Package
com.jmex.physics.geometry

Packages that use com.jmex.physics.geometry
com.jmex.physics jME Physics 2 
 

Classes in com.jmex.physics.geometry used by com.jmex.physics
PhysicsBox
          Box has a size of (1,1,1) and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and size via local scale.
PhysicsCapsule
          Capsule has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsCylinder
          Cylinder has a radius of 1, a height of 1, and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation, radius via local x scale and height via local z scale.
PhysicsMesh
          A PhysicsMesh can represent any triangle soup that is used a collision geometry.
PhysicsSphere
          Sphere simply has a radius of 1 and a center of (0,0,0) - change center via local translation and radius via uniform local scale.
